channel.title: Pendant Productions - The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater

image.title: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater
image.description: An original, aerial sci-fi adventure serial

channel.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
channel.itunes:subtitle: An original, OTR-style aerial sci-fi adventure serial
channel.itunes:summary: An original, aerial sci-fi adventure serial!
channel.itunes:keywords: radio drama, OTR, old time radio, sci-fi, science fiction

item.title: The Dixie Stenberg Comic Book!
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Help make the Dixie Stenberg comic book a reality!

item.title: Dixie Stenberg Season One in High-Quality MP3!
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Seaon One now available for High-Quality MP3 download!

item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 50 - A heroic action is made as The Beasts overwhelm Brassy Battalion!

item.title: Episode 50 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Bill Fisher, assistant director Bruce Busby and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 50

item.description: Episode 50 Anniversary Reel

item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 49 - It's the ultimate robot showdown while the Battalion boxes in The Beast and surprises are summoned!

item.title: Episode 49 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Bill Fisher, assistant director Bruce Busby and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 49

item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Bill Fisher, assistant director Bruce Busby and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 48

item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Bill Fisher, assistant director Bruce Busby and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 47

item.description: Episode 46 - Benedikt shoots for the moon in a deadly dogfight!

item.description: Director Bill Fisher, assistant director Bruce Busby and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 46

item.title: Episode 45 - The Occidental Nazis
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 45 - The curtain drops on Vreni's dramatic past while Billingsley and Walther have a final showdown!

item.title: Episode 45 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Bill Fisher, assistant director Bruce Busby and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 45

item.title: Episode 44 - The Intuition of Lily LaRue
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 44 - Lilly relives tragedies and triumphs as she's forced to chose between a friend and a foe!

item.title: Episode 44 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher, assistant director Jim Hamilton and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 44

item.description: Episode 43 - Tommy and Neve dogfight as their twisted past is revealed!

item.title: Episode 43 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher, assistant director Jim Hamilton and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 43

item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 42 - Cornelius takes charge as he relives the tragedies of a past war!

item.title: Episode 42 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher, assistant director Jim Hamilton and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 42

item.title: Episode 41 - The Dauntlessness of Joey Scalzetti
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 41 - Joey's past and biceps are revealed as he's shot down in a fire fight over New York City!

item.title: Episode 41 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher, assistant director Jim Hamilton and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 41

item.title: Episode 40 - The Final Revelation of Archibald Withersby
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 40 - Brassy Battalion return to the skies and Withersby unveils the Beast's secrets!

item.title: Episode 40 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher, assistant director Jim Hamilton and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 40

item.title: Episode 39 - The Return of Brassy Battalion
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 39 - A spy advises SCAR while Dixie reunites Brassy Battalion!

item.title: Episode 39 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher, assistant director Jim Hamilton and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 39

item.title: Episode 38 - The Unexpected Arrival
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 38 - An unexpected arrival changes Dixie's life while Vreni plots evil and the President has orders for our heroes!

item.title: Episode 38 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher, assistant director Jim Hamilton and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 38

item.title: Episode 37 - The Rattling Return
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 37 - Withersby unveils a cryptic mission, while Geist's power shifts radically and Dixie braves a moment that will change her life!

item.title: Episode 37 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher, assistant director Jim Hamilton and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 37

item.title: Episode 36 - The Remembrance Reunion
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 36 - Surprises abound as our heroes reunite and struggle with a changed world!

item.title: Episode 36 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher, and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 36

item.title: Episode 35 - The The Righteous Bushwack
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 35 - The Beast executes its revenge while Brassy Battalion assaults the SCAR base!

item.title: Episode 35 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher, assistant director Jim Hamilton and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 35

item.title: Episode 34 - The Clash of the Comrades
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 34 - Our heroes fight their most dangerous foes yet... each other!

item.title: Episode 34 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher, assistant director Jim Hamilton and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 34

item.title: Episode 33 - The Pertinence Predicament
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 33 - Tommy's life hangs in the balance as the Battalion and SCAR prepare for the coming showdown!

item.title: Episode 33 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher, assistant director Jim Hamilton and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 33

item.title: Episode 32 - The Tribulations of Kinship
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 32 - Tensions build between Lily and her cousins, things boil over between Esmerelda and Cornelius and Dixie cares for a wounded Thomas!

item.title: Episode 32 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 32

item.title: Episode 31 - The Rumble in the Jungle
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 31 - The ladies LaRue assist at the base as Dixie and Freudenberg search for Tommy, and secrets are revealed!

item.title: Episode 31 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 31

item.title: Episode 30 - The Antipathetic Confederacy
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 30 - Geist sends Billingsley to liberate Volker, Nebulon 2000 reacquires the Beast and Neve's mystery deepens!

item.title: Episode 30 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 30

item.title: Episode 29 - The Collateral of Lily LaRue
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 29 - Zeta Squad catches Thomas alone in the sky, while The Beast rampages, and Lily has a bouquet of surprises for Brassy Battalion!

item.title: Episode 29 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 29

item.title: Episode 28 - The Hypogean Grotto
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 28 - Dixie runs for her life as the Battalion tracks the beast. A villain returns to power, and a new hero emerges!

item.title: Episode 28 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 28

item.title: Episode 27 - The Austral Leviathan
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 27 - The Battalion hunts for SCAR, who hunt for the deadly beast! Villainous secrets are revealed, and an enemy gets an upgrade!

item.title: Episode 27 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 27

item.title: Episode 26 - The Meridional Contemplation
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 26 - Strained tensions cloud Brassy Battalion, as the forces of SCAR go hunting through the jungle only to become the prey!

item.title: Episode 26 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 26

item.title: Episode 25 - The Belly Deep Slough
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 25 - Another year has passed and Brassy Battalion has taken the fight to the front lines of the war! They may soon discover, however, that things are more turbulent at home than in the skies over Germany!

item.title: Episode 25 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 25

item.title: Episode 24 - The Lamentable Eventuality
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 24 - It's Brassy Battalion vs. SCAR, Robot vs. robot and more of Dixie vs. Geist in all-out war, the results of which may be something none of them expected! Or it could be what everyone expected! Just listen already and find out!

item.title: Episode 24 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 24

item.title: Episode 23 - The Elixir Incident
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 23 - It's Dixie vs. Geist, round two, and this time Dixie's evened the playing field! But for how long? Billingsley chooses a partner and Brassy Battalion arrives on the scene!

item.title: Episode 23 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 23

item.title: Episode 22 - The Payback Under the Pacific
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 22 - Brassy Battalion is on a sub, on a mission and on the hunt for their leader! A wounded Dixie is brought before Geist, but she'll still take every chance she gets to rip SCAR apart!

item.title: Episode 22 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 22

item.title: Episode 21 - The Savage Struggle
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 21 - Dixie is aboard the underwater SCAR base, but now what? And SCAR won't take this lying down! Cornelius, Frank and Archie have a surprise up their sleeves, one which may just give Brassy Battalion what they need most... hope.

item.title: Episode 21 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 21

item.title: Episode 20 - The Subaqueous Substratum
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 20 - Our hero has been shot down! Alone in the dark, in the deep, she must face her failures and her fears in order to survive. But she's not out of fight, never out of fight. Not our Dixie!

item.title: Episode 20 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 20

item.title: Episode 19 - The Oracular Spectacular
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 19 - Dixie, strong of mind and strong of will, rebuffs the Battalion and heads after SCAR on her own! She's determined to disrupt their plans, but first she'll have to get through Reginald Billingsley and Zeta Squad, which is easier said than done!

item.title: Episode 19 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 19

item.title: Episode 18 - The Amber Avenger
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 18 - Dixie puts the Amber Avenger to the test as Neve springs into action! Brassy Battalion deals with the aftermath of the attack and Billingsley's confidence grows... as does Dixie's determination!

item.title: Episode 18 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 18

item.title: Episode 17 - The Attack on AeroQuest
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 17 - Dixie tries to decide what to do with their prisoner, but Neve's not about to just sit around and wait to find out. Zeta Squad comes for their compatriot, and Brassy Battalion is caught unawares and the results spell disaster!

item.title: Episode 17 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 17

item.title: Episode 16 - The Mystery Woman
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 16 - Joey and Esmerelda hit it off over a pot of mostaciolli, an interrogation doesn't go as planned, and Thomas Galen's love has arrived -- but just who's side is Neve on?

item.title: Episode 16 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 16

item.title: Episode 15 - The Other Side of the Fence
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 15 - Just who did Dixie shoot down in the mountains? Billingsley returns to the SCAR base, and a discussion with Vreni leads to an important acquisition. The troops show off their handiwork and, finally, meet the members of Zeta Squad!

item.title: Episode 15 COMMENTARY
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Director Seth Adam Sher and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Umket Industries Presents: The Dixie Stenberg and Brassy Battalion Adventure Theater episode 15

item.title: Episode 14 - The More Things Change
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 14 - Brassy Battalion has been on a wild goose chase all across the globe as they try to track down the elusive Zeta Squadron! Unfortunately the results have not been as anticipated, but hope may yet be found deep within the San Gabriel mountains!

item.title: Episode 13 - The Disheartening Discovery
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 13 - The trip back to the United States provides Dixie some time to think, but she's not happy about the conclusions she comes to. A short stop over in Georgia allows for some downtime on the Pearson Peach Plantation, where Cornelius has a few surprising announcements!

item.title: Episode 12 - The Bastion of Evil
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 12 - Dixie takes the fight to SCAR! It's mayhem and destruction in the skies over Germany, and Brassy Battalion won't rest until the Society for the Continuation of Aggression and Ruination is wiped off the face of the earth! But SCAR won't go down without a fight and Reginald Billingsley has a big secret up his sleeve!

item.title: Episode 11 - The Anticipation at AeroQuest
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 11 - Vreni and Volker study the beast and get a most unexpected call as Lily and Freudenberg take things to the next level. Withersby has a plan to take SCAR down, but the mission comes with more than its share of risk!

item.title: Episode 10 - The Compendiary Jubilee
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 10 - Brassy Battalion heads out for a much needed and well-deserved celebration! Just how did Dixie meet McGuff, and what is the most unspeakable secret that only Frank knows? The Battalion gets a new government liaison and Vreni has had more than enough of Volker and Billingsley!

item.title: Episode 9 - The Donnybrook in Death Valley
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 9 - Billingsley's escaped! Dixie and the Battalion are hot on his trail, leading straight to a base in Death Valley where the full might of the Brassy Battalion is unleashed upon the nefarious Nazis! What is the special gift Fruedenberg has prepared for Lily, and can Volker and Vreni stop the escaped beast before it chews its way through all of SCAR?

item.title: Episode 8 - The Secret of Reginald Billingsley
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 8 - Does Billingsley work for SCAR? The evidence Dixie finds may provide the answer, but only if Dixie can make it back to AeroQuest Dynamics without getting caught! And what is Freudenberg's first name, and why does Benedikt find it so funny?

item.title: Episode 7 - The Hidden Truth
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 7 - Freudenberg gives Brassy Battalion a special gift! What happened to Billingsley? What secret is Joey Scalzetti hiding? What lurks in the deep, dark SCAR dungeon? And who's the mysterious person in McGuff's office?

item.title: Episode 6 - The Rescue of Thomas Galen
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 6 - Dixie and Cornelius head straight into Nazi Germany on a rescue mission, and find more than they bargained for deep beneath the earth! The beast is alive, SCAR is hot on their tail and... someone has vanished!

item.title: Episode 5 - The Traitor Within
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 5 - The Brassy Battalion members are at each other's throats! Who is the traitor, and what has become of poor Thomas Galen? Dixie finally comes up with a plan, and just what is the vicious Vreni hiding?

item.title: Episode 4 - The Skirmish at Stuttgart
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 4 - Dixie and crew go into live combat for the first time, on a precision strike right into the heart of Germany! But just what does the villainous Volker have planned and will all of Brassy Battalion make it back home?

item.title: Episode 3 - The Global Menagerie
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 3 - Dixie meets her new colleagues with the official formation of the First Brassy Battalion Fighter Squadron! An eclectic bunch of green recruits from around the world are now under Dixie's command, but do they have any hope of working together if they can't even get along? And just who are SCAR, and what is their dastardly plan?

item.title: Episode 2 - The Uninvited Guest
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 2 - What are German Focke-Wulf 190's doing in the skies over Southern California? Will our hero survive being sorely outnumbered? Just what does the special brassy alloy on Dixie's Thunderbolt do, and why is there a hidden lever under Dixie's seat?

item.title: Episode 1 - The Visitor From Washington
item.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
item.description: Episode 1 - Dixie arrives at a hidden, private hangar in Southern California. She's a test pilot for AeroQuest Dynamics, and this day is not going to go as planned. Who is the visitor from Washington, and just what does he want with Dixie?
